Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2017 11:11AM meg1156 wrote: I am postmenopausal and had ER and PR first stage.I have an ileostomy and found arimidex caused extreme diahrhea. I expect that tamoxifen may cause the same thing. Does any source produce statistics of not using either and what the percentage of recurrent stage one is? Is there an ileostomate out there with advice? Thank you.
Posts.Title: I am not a candidate for Tamoxifen due to the side effects debmary1 Fearless59
